content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ introducing our autumn wheat cardigan a delightful flat crocheted cardigan designed especially for beginners featuring an easy stitch repeat and a comprehensive video tutorial to guide you through every step of the process this size-inclusive cardigan ranges from xs to 5x ensuring everyone can enjoy this stylish creation s cozy comfort pattern highlights easy stitch repeat perfect for crochet enthusiasts of all skill levels our autumn wheat cardigan showcases a simple yet elegant stitch pattern that is easy to master making it an ideal project for beginners seeking a stylish and satisfying creation video tutorial included we ve got you covered every step of the way our detailed video tutorial ensures that even if you re new to crocheting you ll be able to create your very own autumn wheat cardigan with confidence cuff-to-cuff construction this unique cardigan is crafted from cuff to cuff starting with the ribbing for one cuff you ll then seamlessly progress to working on the sleeves increasing as you go the design takes you through crocheting the back section to create space for the neck followed by the first and second parts of the body the second sleeve is then crafted all while decreasing for the final cuff the finishing touch involves adding ribbing around the front opening requiring just two simple seams to transform your creation into a cozy and stylish cardigan ribbed crochet style embrace a touch of texture with the ribbed crochet style featured in our autumn wheat cardigan the ribbing not only adds visual interest but also enhances the overall comfort and fit of this fabulous piece size-inclusive we believe that everyone deserves to experience the joy of creating and wearing a stunning handmade garment our pattern accommodates sizes from xs to 5x ensuring that individuals of all shapes and sizes can enjoy the warmth and style of the autumn wheat cardigan schematic and supply list included in pattern notions scissors 1 yarn needle 2 removable stitch marker 3 yarn lion brand color theory 4 100% acrylic worsted weight yarn 246yds/100g colorways shown moonbeam or stonewash embrace the joy of crocheting your very own autumn wheat cardigan a versatile stylish and size-inclusive piece that s perfect for cozying up in any season whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting your crafting journey this project promises a rewarding and fashionable experience get ready to wear your creativity with pride cheers - let s be friends on social media website http //www
